name: AVAudioInputNode
desc: An object that connects to the systemâ€™s audio input.

items.name: func setManualRenderingInputPCMFormat(AVAudioFormat, inputBlock: AVAudioIONodeInputBlock) -> Bool
items.desc: Supplies the data through the input node to the engine while operating in the manual rendering mode.

items.name: typealias AVAudioIONodeInputBlock
items.desc: The type that represents a block to render operation calls to get input data when in manual rendering mode.

items.name: var isVoiceProcessingInputMuted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the input of the voice processing unit is in a muted state.

items.name: var isVoiceProcessingBypassed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the node is bypassing all processing of the voice processing unit.

items.name: var isVoiceProcessingAGCEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether automatic gain control on the processed microphone or uplink signal is active.
